message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $22,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value. While $15,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $18,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still feel that $15,000 would be a fair price for the product. I hope we can find common ground.
